SELECT GI.GROUP_INFO_SEQ, GI.INTER_BIG_SEQ, IB.BIG_NAME, GI.INTER_SMALL_SEQ, ISM.SMALL_NAME, GI.GROUP_NAME
FROM GROUP_INFO GI JOIN INTER_BIG IB ON GI.INTER_BIG_SEQ = IB.INTER_BIG_SEQ JOIN INTER_SMALL ISM ON GI.INTER_SMALL_SEQ = ISM.INTER_SMALL_SEQ

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN INTER_BIG_SEQ=1 THEN 1 END) AS 'value1', COUNT(CASE WHEN INTER_BIG_SEQ=2 THEN 1 END) AS 'value2', COUNT(CASE WHEN INTER_BIG_SEQ=3 THEN 1 END) AS 'value3', COUNT(CASE WHEN INTER_BIG_SEQ=4 THEN 1 END) AS 'value4' FROM GROUP_INFO
